title: Pit Boss 820 Wood Pellet BBQ
description:
Grill and smoke with the perfect combination of heat and natural woad to really capture the most amazing barbecue taste.

- Easy to operate with a simple one-touch ignition dial.
- Digital control board for easy temperature control (180-500°F).
- All natural wood barbecue pellets for a delicious smoked flavor.

asset.author: Pit Boss Grills
asset.description:
Grill and smoke with the perfect combination of heat and natural woad to really capture the most amazing barbecue taste.

- Easy to operate with a simple one-touch ignition dial.
- Digital control board for easy temperature control (180-500°F).
- All natural wood barbecue pellets for a delicious smoked flavor.

More info at pitboss-grills.com

transcripts:
If you're looking for competition quality barbecue in your own backyard, then look no further than cooking with 100% hardwood pellets on a Pit Boss grill. The Put Boss eliminates hassles of ordinary grills so you can cook with confidence for every meal. 

The Put Boss revolutionizes grilling in three important ways. The pit boss oven temperature control and lid thermometer allows for precise temperatures. Precise temperature control means you can rely on even heat fro perfection grilling. And, the use of 100% hard wood pellets instead of charcoal or propane allows you enjoy the amazing wood flavor with a simple dial of the oven temperature control. The pit boss has over 800 square inches of grilling space and a temperature range of 170 to 500 degrees. With this versatility, you'll be finding reasons to cook out every night and clean up is a cinch. The Pit Boss has a hopper with a 20  pound capacity of 100% hardwood pellets and is constructed with heavy duty steel and solid legs, making it strong and long lasting.  Plus, there are two large easy rolling wheels allowing for easy movement. Getting the put boss started is simple. Pouring your favorite variety of 100% hardwood pellets. Turn the oven temperature control to the desired temperature, the grill lights itself, and adjusts feed rate to maintain your desired cooking temperature. When the grill is at the desired temperature, begin cooking. You'll be amazed at what the convected heat of a Pit Boss grill with 100% percent hard wood pellets can do. Barbecue, smoke, grill, saute, and bake all to perfection. All of this maintained by Pit Boss oven temperature control. If you are new at grilling and a seasoned pro, Pit Boss is the perfect addition to you backyard or patio. The Put Boss. Competition quality in your own backyard.
